name: pmvc
description: PureMVC (pmvc) is a lightweight framework for creating applications based upon the classic [Model-View-Controller](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Model-view-controller) design meta-pattern. This is a JavaScript port of the [AS3 reference implementation of the MultiCore Version](https://github.com/PureMVC/puremvc-as3-multicore-framework/wiki). It supports [modular programming](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Modular_programming) through the use of [Multiton](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiton) Core actors.

scripts.dist: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=production webpack -p --config ./webpack.prod.js && npm run dist:lib
scripts.start:example: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch examples/simple --exec 'npm run lint:example && BABEL_ENV=development babel-node examples/simple/index.js'
scripts.start: NODE_ENV=development nodemon --watch src --exec 'npm run lint && BABEL_ENV=development babel-node src/pmvc.js'
scripts.build:lib: BABEL_ENV=development npm run lint && BABEL_ENV=development babel src -d dist
scripts.dist:lib: BABEL_ENV=production npm run lint && BABEL_ENV=production babel src -d dist --no-comments
